name: 🧻 Backups
description: View the files that are backed up each day.

name: 📗 Bookmarklets
description: View and setup available bookmarklets.

name: 💉 CRO Deliverables Metrics
description: CRO Deliverables Metrics

name: 😯 Code samples for producing Graphics
description: Experimental: You can see a range of examples of graphs & figures here, produced with either SAS or R. You can then copy the code for use in your own work as a starting point.

name: ❓ Edit localStorage
description: Edit bookmarks from the browser's localStorage, which are then used with a bookmarklet to implement LSAF bookmarks.

name: 👻 File viewer
description: File viewer which can be used to view many files on LSAF. You can navigate the file system to find what you want.

name: ⚙ Final - TLF bundles
description: Final TLF bundles.

name: 🐶 GADAM Data Refresh Events
description: Dashboard focusing on the refreshing of data for GADAM. Shows SDTM, ADAM and Reports along with what days they were run on. Clicking provides detail for files.

name: 📊 GADAM jobs
description: GADAM jobs that have run recently, and their status. Bars can be clicked on to open the log viewer for the selected job.

name: 🧩 GADAM vs. Study Compare
description: List of available gadam vs study compares and currently active cro oversight folders.

name: 🧨 In-text Tables
description: See relationships between In-text tables, data and actual tables

name: 🧠 Insight - studies
description: Martijn's insight app.

name: 🎰 LOT editor (under development)
description: Experimental: LOT editor, to replace the current useof EXCEL for LOTs

name: 📺 LSAF Resources Monitoring 1
description: Simple resources are recorded to CSV files every 5 minutes. This app reads these files and displays the data in a dashboard.

name: 📺 LSAF Resources Monitoring 2
description: Resources are recorded to CSV files every 5 minutes. This app reads these files and displays the data in a dashboard.

name: 🐛 LSAF sync
description: Analysis of people using the LSAF sync app. Shows what they have synced from LSAF to their PC.

name: 🪓 Log viewer
description: SAS log viewer which can be used to view logs on LSAF.

name: 📍 Map of QS staff
description: Experimental:  Map to show where QS staff live.

name: 🎼 REST API
description: LSAF REST API interface to run job automatically.

name: 🤡 Reporting Event Dashboard
description: This is a new version of the reporting event dashboard. It provides an overview of reporting events which are currently active. There are links to study dashboards and file viewer for examining the files.

name: 🎳 Request Tracker
description: Track work on requests.

name: 🔬 Resource management
description: Experimental: This was the first attempt at making a dashboard for resource management. It is not used any more, but demonstrates some useful techniques that could be used in future apps.

name: ⭐ STAR documentation
description: SAS code documentation generated automatically by Doxygen from the SAS code comments. This is hosted on SharePoint. It must be manually re-generated when the code changes, and then uploaded to SharePoint.

name: 🔍 Search Tools
description: This displays the available search tools for TLF programs, outputs, ADaM datasets and SVG graphics.

name: 💡 Source of SDTM data
description: Choose where to take SDTM data from to copy to sdtm_last.

name: 👩 Staff
description: View the QS programming staff

name: 🧯 Statistical Programming Dashboard
description: Key items that require attention from Statistical Programming.

name: 🏠 Studies Info
description: Study level dashboard showing how recently data has been updated.

name: 🎅 Studies Resource Management
description: Experimental: Set key dates, assign resources and visualise this in Gantt charts.

name: 🦙 Study Dashboard
description: This is the dashboard for a specific study, but you can navigate to other studies from here.

name: 🧙 Study People
description: Specify key roles in studies.

name: ⛳ Subscribe
description: Subscribe to notifications about information about studies such as new data, changes in status.

name: 🧪 Testing
description: Testing status for various technical items.

name: 🔰 Text Viewer
description: jean-Michel's Text viewer, which is very flexible working with any text files from LSAF, PC or clipboard.

name: 🎯 View
description: View (& edit) JSON files.
